mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(order_id, userid, order_rec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, order_hp, total) values(#{order_id}, #{userid}, #{order_rec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, #{order_hp}, #{total})
insert into order_details(order_details_id, order_id, product_id, order_amount) select order_details_id_seq.nextval, #{order_id}, product_id, amount from cart
mapper.select: select o.total, o.order_date, d.order_id, d.order_details_id, d.delivery_status, d.order_amount, p.product_name, p.picture_url, p.product_id from product p, tbl_order o, order_details d where d.order_id=o.order_id and d.product_id=p.product_id and o.userid=#{userid} order by d.order_details_id
mapper.update: update order_details set delivery_status='cancel' where order_id=#{param1}
